Thank you for applying for the {{ $('Get Form Data').item.json.content.answers['17'].answer }} position at [Company Name]! We're excited to inform you that your application has made a strong impression on our team.

After reviewing your resume and cover letter, we're impressed by your qualifications, particularly:

  2. {{ $json.strengths[1] }}

We would love to move forward with the interview process!

NEXT STEPS:

We noticed you indicated your preferred interview time as {{ $('Get Form Data').item.json.content.answers['15'].prettyFormat }}. We'd be happy to accommodate this, or we can offer alternative times if needed.

Our interview will be approximately 60 minutes and will cover:

  • Your technical experience and projects
  • Problem-solving scenarios
  • Team fit and career goals

Please reply to this email with your confirmation, or let us know if you'd like to suggest different time slots. We're flexible and want to make this convenient for you!

WHAT TO EXPECT:

  • Interview Format: [Video call/In-person/Phone]
  • Interviewers: [Names and titles]
  • Please prepare to discuss specific projects from your resume
  • Feel free to ask us questions about the role, team, and company culture

We're looking forward to speaking with you soon!

Best regards,

[HR Manager Name]

[Title]

[Company Name]

[Email] | [Phone]

P.S. If you have any questions before the interview, don't hesitate to reach out!

parameters.message:
= Application Update

Thank You for Applying

[Company Name]

Dear {{ $('Get Form Data').item.json.content.answers['11'].answer.first }},

Thank you for your interest in the {{ $('Get Form Data').item.json.content.answers['17'].answer }} position at [Company Name] and for taking the time to submit your application. We truly appreciate the effort you put into applying.

After careful review of your qualifications, we have decided not to move forward with your application for this particular role at this time. This decision was not made lightly, as we received applications from many qualified candidates.

What's Next?

  • We encourage you to explore other positions at [Company Name] that might be a better match for your skills
  • We'll keep your resume on file for 6 months and will reach out if a more suitable position opens up
  • You're welcome to apply again in the future as you gain additional experience

ğŸ” Explore Other Opportunities

We have other positions that might interest you based on your background and skills.

View All Open Positions

ğŸ“š Resources to Consider

To build skills relevant to {{ $('Get Form Data').item.json.content.answers['17'].answer }} roles, you might explore:

  • Online courses for relevant skills (Coursera, Udemy, freeCodeCamp)
  • Contributing to open-source projects on GitHub
  • Building a portfolio of relevant projects
  • Networking with professionals in the field on LinkedIn

We genuinely wish you the best in your job search and career development. Thank you again for considering [Company Name] as a potential employer.

Best regards,

[HR Manager Name]

[Title]

[Company Name]

[Email] | [Phone]

Stay Connected with Us

Follow us for future opportunities and company updates

Application Update

[Company Name]

Dear {{ $('Get Form Data').item.json.content.answers['11'].answer.first }},

Thank you for taking the time to apply for the {{ $('Get Form Data').item.json.content.answers['17'].answer }} position at [Company Name]. We appreciate your interest in joining our team.

We have completed our initial review of your application. Your background shows promise, and we see potential in your profile:

Key Strengths

  1. {{ $json.strengths[0] }}
  2. {{ $json.strengths[1] }}
  3. {{ $json.strengths[2] }}

Current Status

Your application is currently under consideration alongside other candidates. We need a bit more time to complete our assessment process, but we wanted to keep you informed of where things stand.

Timeline

  • We expect to make our decision within the next 5-7 business days
  • If selected to move forward, we'll reach out to schedule an interview
  • We will notify all applicants of our final decision regardless of outcome

What This Means

We're carefully evaluating all qualified candidates to find the best fit for both the role and our team. Your application remains active and is receiving full consideration.

ğŸ“ Have More to Share?

In the meantime, if you have:

  • Additional portfolio work or projects you'd like to share
  • Recent certifications or achievements
  • Questions about the role or our company

Please feel free to reply to this email. We're happy to review any supplementary materials that might strengthen your application.

We appreciate your patience during this process and will be in touch soon.

Best regards,

[HR Manager Name]

[Title]

=Interview Brief: {{ $('Get Form Data').item.json.content.answers['11'].answer.first }} {{ $('Get Form Data').item.json.content.answers['11'].answer.last }} - {{ $('Get Form Data').item.json.content.answers['17'].answer }} (Score: {{ $('Switch').item.json.compatibility_score }}/10)

parameters.content:
# AI-powered resume screening and candidate email automation
This automation helps HR professionals and recruitment teams in handling high application volumes by saving hours on manual review of job applications.

## What It Does: 
1. Candidate fills out a job application (template used from Jotform)
2. Application receives and triggers this workflow
3. Candidate's submission and CV gets downloaded and parsed.
4. AI Agent analyses their CV and profile and checks their compatibility with the job profile.
5. AI generates detailed analysis of the candidate and puts them under - Strong, Moderate or Weak candidate category
6. Each candidate receives a personalized email:  - Strong candidate gets a confirmation of their interview date, - Moderate candidate gets a hold request for the job application, - Weak candidate gets rejected with positive feedback
7. HR gets forwarded with the strong candidate insights like profile details, their strengths, concerns, skills, questions they should ask during the interview etc. on their email inbox

## 1. **JotForm**
* Create a form on [JotForm](https://www.jotform.com/?partner=nitindixit) (use [Job Application Template](https://www.jotform.com/form-templates/job-application))
* Get API key â†’ Settings â†’ API
* Add n8n credentials: **JotForm account**
* Add form ID in **JotForm Trigger**

## 2. **Get Form Data**
* Create HTTP Header Auth: **JotForm**
* Header: `APIKEY = Your JotForm API Key`
* Use in **Get Form Data** & **Download Resume** nodes

## 3. **LlamaCloud (PDF Parsing)**
* Sign up at [LlamaCloud](https://cloud.llamaindex.ai/) â†’ get API key
* Create HTTP Header Auth: **LlamaCloud**
* Header: `Authorization = Bearer YOUR_TOKEN_HERE`
* Apply to **Upload**, **Check Parsing**, **Retrieve Result**

## 4. **OpenAI (AI Analysis)**
* Get API key from [OpenAI](https://platform.openai.com/)
* Add n8n credentials: **OpenAI account**
* Use in **Chat Model** node (default: `gpt-4o-mini`)

## 5. **Gmail (Email Automation)**
* Add OAuth2 credentials: **Gmail account**
* Apply to all **Send Email** nodes
* Replace placeholders (`[Company Name]`, `[HR Manager Name]`, etc.)
* Update HR recipient in **Send a message** node

AI Agent.output:

```json
{
  "compatibility_score": 2,
  "recommendation": "Weak Match",
  "experience_years": "5",
  "education": "Bachelor of Mechatronics Engineering with Honours",

    "programming_languages": [],
    "frameworks": [],
    "tools": [],
    "databases": []
  },
  "key_strengths": [
    "Project Management: The candidate has certifications in Project Management Professional (PMP) and has managed multiple projects, showcasing strong leadership skills.",
    "Efficiency Improvement: Proven track record of achieving operational efficiency and cost reduction in previous roles, which is an asset in development tasks.",
    "Technical Expertise: Strong background in mechatronics and automation, indicating good problem-solving skills in technical scenarios."
  ],
  "concerns": [
    "The candidate has no relevant experience in software development or programming languages, which is essential for a Senior Developer position.",
    "The application lacks detailed technical skills related to software development, such as programming languages and frameworks.",
    "The cover letter is vague and does not articulate specific reasons for applying to the Senior Developer position."
  ],
  "relevant_experience": [
    {
      "role": "Mechatronics Engineer",
      "company": "Borcelle Technologies",
      "duration": "Jan 2023 - Present",
      "key_achievements": "Led development of an advanced automation system, achieving a 15% increase in operational efficiency."
    },
    {
      "role": "System Engineer",
      "company": "Arrowai Industries",
      "duration": "Feb 2021 - Dec 2022",
      "key_achievements": "Designed and optimised a robotic control system, realizing a 12% performance improvement."
    }
  ],
  "interview_focus_areas": [
    "Assess any transferable skills that may relate to software development.",
    "Explore the candidate's knowledge of programming languages or willingness to learn.",
    "Discuss project management skills and how they can transition into a tech-focused environment."
  ],
  "overall_assessment": "Nitin Dixit's application reflects a strong background in engineering, particularly in mechatronics, but lacks relevant experience and skills directly applicable to the Senior Developer role. He is not a suitable candidate for this position given the requirement for software development expertise."
}
```

BENJAMIN SHAH

Address: 123 Anywhere St., Any City

Phone: 123-456-7890

Email: hello@reallygreatsite.com

Website: www.reallygreatsite.com

# SUMMARY

Results-oriented Mechanical and Mechatronics Engineer seeking a challenging position to apply expertise in designing and implementing innovative solutions for complex engineering challenges. Proven track record of success in project management, problem-solving, and cross-functional collaboration. Adept at utilising cutting-edge technologies to optimise processes and enhance overall efficiency.

# WORK EXPERIENCE

# Mechatronics Engineer, Borcelle Technologies

Jan 2023 - Present

- Led development of an advanced automation system, achieving a 15% increase in operational efficiency.
- Streamlined manufacturing processes, reducing production costs by 10%.
- Implemented preventive maintenance strategies, resulting in a 20% decrease in equipment downtime.

# System Engineer, Arrowai Industries

Feb 2021 - Dec 2022

- Designed and optimised a robotic control system, realizing a 12% performance improvement.
- Coordinated testing and validation, ensuring compliance with industry standards.
- Provided technical expertise, contributing to a 15% reduction in system failures.

# Junior Project Engineer, Salford & Co Manufacturing

Mar 2020 - Jan 2021

- Managed full lifecycle of a cutting-edge automation project, meeting all milestones.
- Conducted feasibility studies and risk assessments, mitigating potential project risks.
- Collaborated with clients, leading to a 25% increase in customer satisfaction.

# EDUCATION

# Bachelor of Mechatronics Engineering with Honours

Aug 2016 - Oct 2019

University of Engineering Excellence

Major in Automotive Technology.

Thesis on "Technological Advancements within the current Mechatronics Industryâ€.

# Diploma in Mechanical Engineering

May 2014 - May 2016

Engineering University

Relevant coursework in Structural Design and Project Management.

# ADDITIONAL INFORMATION

Technical Skills: Mechatronics System Integration, Automotive Engineering Technology, Project Management, Robotics and Automation, CAD for Mechatronics.

Languages: English, Malay, Japan.

Certifications: Professional Engineer (PE) License, Project Management Professional (PMP).

Awards/Activities: Actively participated in the "Innovation for Tomorrow" community outreach program, promoting STEM education and inspiring local students.
